dc_title_s: Map shewing portion of the west coast of Vancouver Island compiled and drawn by direction of The Honerable G. B. Martin Chief Commissioner of Lands and Works.
dc_description_s: MiU copies annotated to show land ownership. 1 map: col., mounted on cloth; 61 x 86 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: British Columbia. Department of Lands and Works.,Martin, G.B.
